t: Protestation of Integrity and Prayer for Protection.
Vindicate*pn me, O Lord,*s for I have walked in my integrity, And*ln I have trusted in the Lord*s without wavering.
Examine*ln me, O Lord,*s and try me; Test*ln my mind and my heart.
For*ln Your lovingkindness is before my eyes, And*ln I have walked in Your truth.
I*ln do not sit with deceitful men, Nor*ln will I go with pretenders.
I*ln hate the assembly of evildoers, And*ln I will not sit with the wicked.
I*ln shall wash my hands in innocence, And*ln I will go about Your altar, O Lord,*s
That*ln I may proclaim with the voice of thanksgiving And*ln declare all Your wonders.
O*ln Lord,*s I love the habitation of Your house And*ln the place where Your glory dwells.
Do*ln not take my soul away along*i with sinners, Nor*ln my life with men of bloodshed,
In*ln whose hands is a wicked scheme, And*ln whose right hand is full of bribes.
But*ln as for me, I shall walk in my integrity; Redeem*ln me, and be gracious to me.
My*ln foot stands on a level place; In*ln the congregations I shall bless the Lord.*s
